question:
You have organized to go on holiday with your friend. However, you must change your plans.


Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:
1. Tell them how much you are looking forward to the holiday.
2. Explain why you must change your plans.
3. Suggest alternative arrangements.
text: How are you? I hope you're doing good. I'm writing this letter to let you know about my excitement about the visit to the camping trip next weekend. I've planned our visit to the site. Unfortunately, we have to change our schedule because of my medical emergency.

Let me explain my situation in more detail. The day before yesterday we went to the birthday party of my colleague's daughter. The next morning I was having pain in my stomach and feeling weak. I went to the hospital and got the information that I've come across the food poisoning effect and require full rest at home.

Perhaps due to my medical condition could we plan our trip to the next to next weekend? I've already prepared all the arrangements and spoke with a travel agent. He would provide us the same rooms and the same route to the site. So that there will be no hustle.
I'm extremely sorry for the inconvenience and I look forward to hearing from you.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a preposition with the verb provide. Consider adding the preposition.
